definition: All dissolved oxygen parameters (including saturation and utilisation) for the water column
All forms of horizontal spatial coordinates such as lat/lon and grid references
All parameters relating to horizontal platform travel, including distance run

prefLabel: Snow and ice physical properties and characteristics
definition: Parameters related to physical properties (e.g. colour, density, in-situ temperature) or characteristics (e.g. sea ice type) of any kind of water sample that was in its solid state at the time of sampling or measurement

prefLabel: Ocean colour and earth-leaving visible waveband spectral radiation
definition: Parameters associated with the measurement of ocean colour, including visible waveband satellite spectral radiometer measurements, their calibration measurements (spectral water-leaving radiance and reflectance) and chart colour estimates.

prefLabel: Primary production in the water column
definition: Parameters associated with the quantification of primary production.  This is defined as the fixation of carbon dioxide into either organic or inorganic carbon by living entities and so includes photosynthesis and calcification.

prefLabel: Concentration of silicon species in the water column
definition: Concentration parameters for silicon species (including opal) in all phases of the water column
Parameters relating to the water held by land masses such as soil and vegetation moisture content

prefLabel: Total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) concentration in the water column

definition: Parameters relating to land surface temperature including fire and other hot spot location
Parameters specifying the physical or chemical environment of a place where an organism is found.

prefLabel: Biological detritus in the water column suspended particulate material
definition: Parameters quantifying and categorising biological detritus (eg exuvia and faecal pellets) in the water column that have been derived from the water column

prefLabel: Structure and stability of the water column
definition: Parameters describing or predicting water column structure plus parameters quantifying the dynamic stability of that structure

prefLabel: Ozone and oxygen concentrations in the atmosphere
definition: Ozone and oxygen concentration parameters in any phase of the atmosphere (but usually the gaseous phase)

prefLabel: Sulphur species concentrations in the atmosphere
definition: Concentration of sulphur species (element or compounds) in any phase of the atmosphere. Includes sulphur dioxide.
Concentration of metal elements in any phase of the atmosphere
Parameters related to forces due to interactions between atmosphere and the surface of the earth or between atmospheric air masses
Data parameters that carry information relating to a measured parameter such as measurement temperatures, integration depths, quantities sampled and incubation durations

prefLabel: Concentration of other organic contaminants in the atmosphere
definition: Parameters quantifying concentrations of organic contaminants (substances regarded as harmful) other than PCBs and PAHs in all phases of the atmosphere

prefLabel: Dissolved metal concentrations in the water column
definition: Concentrations of metal elements in the dissolved phase of the water column.  This may include a contribution from the particulate phase if this has not been totally removed by filtration and the metal in question is reactive (ie detected as if it were dissolved) to the analytical technique used.

prefLabel: Particulate inorganic carbon concentrations in the water column
definition: Concentrations of inorganic carbon in the particulate phase of the water column as extracted by a fitration technique.  This is the particle-bound concentration per unit volume of the water column. Consequently, it is both a function of the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of inorganic carbon per unit weight of the SPM.
Parameters specifying the vertical and horizontal spatial extent of the ecological character of a place where an organism is found
Parameters relating to the mapping of terrestrial features, including coastlines

prefLabel: Silicate concentration parameters in the water column
definition: Silicate concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column
Parameters quantifying and describing the release of substances into the atmosphere as a result of human activity
All date and time parameters
Measurements and predictions of the displacement of the water column surface from a fixed, stable reference
Measurements of the displacement of the water column surface from a fixed, stable reference expressed as either total pressure or sea pressure
Parameters quantifying and categorising the particulate phases (solids and aerosols) of the atmosphere, excluding chemical composition
Parameters that classify cloud cover into types such as cumulus and cirrus.
Parameters describing the horizontal and vertical extent of cloud cover

prefLabel: Horizontal velocity of the water column (currents)
definition: Parameters expressing the velocity (including scalar speeds and directions) of water column horizontal movement, commonly termed Eulerian currents
Parameters quantifying the degree of hotness of the atmosphere.  Specifically excludes indirect measurements of other parameters such as wet bulb temperatures.

prefLabel: Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the atmosphere
definition: Includes visible waveband measurements at discrete wavelengths and PAR integrated values as photon and energy fluxes. Does not include satellite radiometer and associated calibration parameters (e.g. water-leaving radiance and reflectance)

prefLabel: Concentration of alkanes in the atmosphere
definition: Alkane concentrations in all phases of the atmosphere
Parameters quantifying the concentration of sodium chloride in any body of water at any point between the bed and the atmosphere

prefLabel: Chlorophyll pigment concentrations in water bodies
definition: Includes all variants of chlorophyll expressed in terms of per unit volume, per unit area of any body of fresh or salt water, or as a relative colour index (e.g. PCI). Does not include data expressed per unit mass of SPM.
All vertical spatial parameters including depth, height and pressure when used as an independent variable.
Parameters specifying the speed and direction of sea or land ice and the stresses associated with this motion.

Includes all parameters covering the strength of electromagnetic radiation signal return, including absolute measurements of returning signal strength as well as parameters expressed as backscatter (the proportion of transmitted signal returned)

Measurements of air pressure as the dependent variable (ie excluding air pressure measured to specify the z co-ordinate of a balloon or sonde), including derived parameters such as tendency (rate of change) and related parameters such as air density.
Parameters quantifying the irradiance of the sun impinging on the Earth's surface in the visible and infra-red waveband, generally accepted as wavelengths between 300 and 3000 nm

prefLabel: Concentration of inorganic halogens in the atmosphere
definition: Concentrations of halogens as elements or their inorganic compounds in all phases of the atmosphere.

prefLabel: Concentration of organic matter in the atmosphere
definition: Parameters quantifying uncategorised organic substance concentrations in atmospheric, generally aerosol, samples such as organic matter and DOC.

prefLabel: Concentration of alkenes and alkynes in the atmosphere
definition: Alkene and alkyne concentrations in all phases of the atmosphere
Absolute determinations of water column density plus parameters (generally expressed as density anomaly) derived from temperature and salinity

prefLabel: Carbon monoxide and dioxide concentrations in the atmosphere
definition: CO and CO2 concentration parameters in any phase of the atmosphere (but usuall the gaseous phase). Includes pCO2.
Statistical parameters derived from wave records to express wave height and period.

prefLabel: Concentration of other hydrocarbons in the atmosphere
definition: 'Other' (not alkanes, alkenes, alkynes or PAHs) hydrocarbon concentration parameters (including saturation of gaseous species) in all phases of the atmosphere.

prefLabel: Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the water column
definition: Includes measurements at discrete wavelengths and PAR integrated values, measurements as photon and energy fluxes.
Parameters that either quantify the water content of moist air or are specifically used in its determination (eg wet bulb air temperature)
Parameters describing the transport of material, heat or energy in the water column
Parameters relating to the measurement of the Earth's gravity field

Parameters quantifying the extent or direction of atmospheric movement. Obvious examples are wind velocity, windspeed and wind direction, but can also include derived parameters such as force, energy, power and power density.

prefLabel: Heat fluxes between the water column and the atmosphere
definition: Parameters quantifying heat exchange between any body of water and the atmosphere

prefLabel: Lagrangian currents and transport rates in the water column
definition: Parameters expressing the mean nett transport rates within the water column like Lagrangian currents. Note this is an unintentional duplicate of VDFC.

prefLabel: Concentration of nitrogen species in the atmosphere
definition: Concentrations of both organic (eg amines) and inorganic (eg ammonia and oxides of nitrogen) nitrogen species in all phases of the atmosphere

prefLabel: Snow and ice mass, thickness and extent
definition: Measurements of quantity (mass), thickness and spatial extent of snow and ice
Parameters relating to all kinds of precipitation (rain, snow, etc.) and water loss from the surface of the Earth
